articles.description: Jets coach Robert Saleh on Thursday refused to rule out Zach Wilson for the season opener despite the quarterback undergoing knee surgery this week.
articles.content: FLORHAM PARK, N.J. -- Even though all signs point to Joe Flacco as the New York Jets' season-opening quarterback, coach Robert Saleh refused to rule out Zach Wilson, who underwent arthroscopic knee s… [+2516 chars]
